```pddl
[
  (:action place
    ; Place an item into a container and update inventory status
    :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?container - object)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (inventory ?agent ?container) (airtight ?container))
    :effect (and (in ?item ?container) (not (inventory ?agent ?item)))
  ),

  (:action separate
    ; Separate items using a specified medium
    :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?medium - material ?container - object)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?medium) (contains ?container ?item) (or (type ?medium type1) (type ?medium type2) (type ?medium type3)))
    :effect (separated ?item ?medium)
  ),

  (:action freeze
    ; Universal action to either freeze or thaw items based on their state
    :parameters (?agent - person ?item - object ?container - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and 
      (in ?item ?container)
      (location ?container ?location)
      (or (and (not (frozen ?item)) (separated ?item ?paper)) ; Preconditions for freezing
          (frozen ?item))                                      ; Preconditions for thawing
    )
    :effect (and 
      (or (and (not (frozen ?item)) (frozen ?item))
          (and (frozen ?item) (not (frozen ?item))))
    )
  )
]
```
